summary: NS and tracheal washes (TW) were collected monthly on 52 standardbred racehorses at training, over 27 consecutive months. nasopharyngeal swabs (NS) aims to determine prevalence and incidence of viral genome detection by qPCR in the equine airways. electronic supplementary material The online version of this article (doi:10.1186/s12985-016-0657-5) contains supplementary material.
